entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:36 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Humidity: 64 %

Dewpoint: -42.4°C
Wind: NW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 33 this evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 33 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
